name: Death By Trolley
description:
Hello, and welcome to Death By Trolley. This game is akin to the well known Trolley Problem. Will you let a trolley run over 5 people, or will you pull the lever to run over 1 instead. In this game however, your goal is to run over as many people as humanly possible!

This game was made in exactly the 3 hour time limit. It was my first time back to game dev after a month and half break. I hope you enjoy the hilarity of it!

Controls

Up/Down Arrows -Toggle Track

Space- Start and Stop Trolley

Reset Game - R

Assets Used:

Paper Texture - https://www.textures.com/download/PaperCrumpled0004/14648

Font - https://www.1001freefonts.com/arabella-font.font
